"use client" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import "./Profile.css" const Profile = ({ token, onLogout }) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const getUser = () => { try { return JSON.parse(atob(token.split(".")[1])) } catch { return { name: "User", email: "user@example.com", id: "1" } } } const user = getUser() const handleLogout = () => { onLogout() navigate("/") } const handleBack = () => { navigate("/dashboard") } return (
